about_the_game:
Step into the Bungo universe and collect the rarest Bungites known to all beings. Collect rare and cool Bungites so you can show them off to your friends! Level them up and see how strong your Bungites can get!

Every Bungite is unique to YOU. Every Bungite you collect has it's own unique generated stats so you and your friends can have the same Bungite that acts completely different! There are already almost a dozen stats in the game with dozens more to be added over time!

Visit the Storng market and bet on Gorg fruit futures so that you can be the wealthiest Bungite Collector in the universe! Bungcoin are very valuable to a Bungite collector, allowing you to get the rarest Bungites!

You can now debate your Bungites with random Bungites from across the universe in the disputation chamber! Watch them in a battle of wits and level up your favorite Bungite into a monster for all to witness!
detailed_description:
Step into the Bungo universe and collect the rarest Bungites known to all beings. Collect rare and cool Bungites so you can show them off to your friends! Level them up and see how strong your Bungites can get!

Every Bungite is unique to YOU. Every Bungite you collect has it's own unique generated stats so you and your friends can have the same Bungite that acts completely different! There are already almost a dozen stats in the game with dozens more to be added over time!

Visit the Storng market and bet on Gorg fruit futures so that you can be the wealthiest Bungite Collector in the universe! Bungcoin are very valuable to a Bungite collector, allowing you to get the rarest Bungites!

You can now debate your Bungites with random Bungites from across the universe in the disputation chamber! Watch them in a battle of wits and level up your favorite Bungite into a monster for all to witness!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Internal Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: None
  • Additional Notes: This should run on any computer

short_description: Collect all of the rarest Bungites and level them up so you can show them off to your friends! Gather Bungcoin to get rarer Bungites, debate them, and watch their stats grow to infinity!
